channel.title: Adding Shops
channel.description:
Hey,
Been trying to add shops to my server, my friends can't help me, and my shop maker doesn't work. So now im asking you to help me. I desperetly need help.
Thanks, Reforced

item.title: Adding Shops

item.description:
